additionalParams.summary: Searches for an element matching the specified value, and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire .
additionalParams.param: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to search.
The value that specifies the element to search for.
additionalParams.exception: Thrown when .Length is less than 1, is outside bounds, is less than 1 or and combined exceed bounds.
additionalParams.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of an element that matches , if found; otherwise, -1.

additionalParams.summary: Searches for an element matching the specified value, and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the range of elements in the that extends from the specified index to the last element.
additionalParams.param: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to search.
The value that specifies the element to search for.
The zero-based starting index of the search.
additionalParams.exception: Thrown when .Length is less than 1, is outside bounds, is less than 1 or and combined exceed bounds.
additionalParams.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of an element that matches , if found; otherwise, -1.

additionalParams.summary: Searches for an element matching the specified value, and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the range of elements in the that extends from the specified index and contains the specified number of elements.
additionalParams.param: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to search.
The value that specifies the element to search for.
The zero-based starting index of the search.
The number of elements in the section to search.
additionalParams.exception: Thrown when .Length is less than 1, is outside bounds, is less than 1 or and combined exceed bounds.
additionalParams.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of an element that matches , if found; otherwise, -1.
